results.definition: resembling glass in smoothness and shininess and slickness
examples: the glassy surface of the lake
the pavement was...glassy with water"- Willa Cather
his eyes were glazed over with boredom

results.definition: (of ceramics) having the surface made shiny and nonporous by fusing a vitreous solution to it
examples: hard vitreous china used for plumbing fixtures
